name: Finger Slinger
description:
Mouse or Touch... (Designed with touch in mind.)

Tap Title Screen to Begin.

Tap Center of Target, Scores Higher.

Tap Sooner, Scores Higher.

*THE SCORE CHART BELOW ASSESSES YOUR ABILITY ON A MOBILE DEVICE.

0 to 999Beginner1000 to 1799Average1800 to 2100ExpertAbove 2100Master

:BGM: URBAN FLIGHT by MUS-MUS [ musmus.main.jp ]
